channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- My Tickets
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- My Tickets

item.title: CVE-2021-24796|2024-08-03T19:42:17.335Z -- unknown -- my%20tickets
item.description: The My Tickets WordPress plugin before 1.8.31 does not properly sanitise and escape the Email field of booked tickets before outputting it in the Payment admin dashboard, which could allow unauthenticated users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks against admins
